titleStmt.title: A true and impartial narrative of the most material debates and passages in the late Parliament. Together with the rise and disolution of it, published for the satisfaction of those that desire to know how they spent their time. By a Member of that Parliament, who is none of the present Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Bethel, Slingsby, 1617-1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Brewster, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the three Bibles in Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Member of that Parliament, who is none of the present Parliament = Slingsby Bethel.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the sign of the three Bibles in Pauls Churchyard
